result.arabic_text: وَلَقَدۡ نَصَرَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِبَدۡرٖ وَأَنتُمۡ أَذِلَّةٞۖ فَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَشۡكُرُونَ
result.translation: Bemeramana! Ni ukuri, Imana Allah Yarabahaye intsinzi ku rugamba rwa Badri, muraheza muranesha abansi banyu kandi mwari bake, mufise n’ibirwanisho bibayabaye, enda rero nimugamburukire Imana Allah mu kwubahiriza amabwirizwa yayo, kugira mushime inema zayo.
